name: Espresso
description: A strong and bold coffee shot made by forcing hot water under pressure through finely-ground coffee beans. Perfect for a quick caffeine boost.

name: Cappuccino
description: An Italian classic with a balanced mix of espresso, steamed milk, and creamy milk foam, often topped with a sprinkle of cocoa powder.

name: Latte
description: A smooth and creamy coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, often flavored with syrups like vanilla, caramel, or hazelnut.

name: Cold Brew
description: A refreshing coffee steeped in cold water for 12-24 hours, resulting in a smooth, less acidic, and highly caffeinated drink.

name: Mocha
description: A delicious fusion of espresso and rich chocolate topped with whipped cream, combining the best of coffee and dessert in one cup.

name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
description: A sweet and refreshing iced coffee drink layered with milk, espresso, and rich caramel drizzle.

name: Americano
description: A classic coffee beverage made by diluting espresso with hot water, offering a smooth and mellow taste.

name: Flat White
description: A velvety coffee made with espresso and microfoam milk, offering a stronger coffee flavor than a latte.

name: Frappuccino
description: A cold and creamy blended coffee drink with ice, milk, and sweet flavors, topped with whipped cream.

name: Irish Coffee
description: A rich coffee cocktail made with hot coffee, Irish whiskey, sugar, and topped with lightly whipped cream.
